comments.body: Why this change? I don't see how it relates, or why a view of the list would be an issue here.

The issue here is that list views are not serializable. This prevents the future addition of automated checks that may require arguments to parallelize() be serializable. This fixes the issue, and does not affect the behaviour of the test.
Ah OK. Kind of unrelated, but OK to fix if it came up while working on the issue.
